description.value: You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disarm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Reposition], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] creatures up to two sizes larger than you, or up to three sizes larger than you if you're legendary in Athletics.
